A '''spider eye''' is a [[food]] [[item]] sourced from [[Spider (disambiguation)|spiders]] that is [[poison]]ous to [[player]]s, but can be safely fed to [[armadillo]]s to [[breed]] them. It is also a [[brewing]] ingredient for [[potions of Poison]], and can be [[fermented]] for further brewing uses.

== Obtaining ==
=== Mob loot ===

{{Drop sources|Spider Eye}}

=== Generated loot ===
{{LootChestItem|spider-eye}}

== Usage ==
=== Food ===
When [[eat]]en, a spider eye restores {{hunger|2}} [[Hunger|hunger points]] and 3.2 [[Hunger#Mechanics|saturation points]], giving a nourishment value of 1.6. It also applies a [[Poison]] [[effect]] lasting 5 seconds to the player, causing {{hp|4|poisoned=1}} damage, which reduces hunger/saturation by 6 points.

=== Breeding ===
Spider eyes can be used to [[breed]] adult [[armadillo]]s and to speed up the growth of baby armadillos. Armadillos that are not rolled up also follow a player who is holding spider eyes.
